title: Been lagging TREMENDOUSLY these couple of weeks
body: So iv'e been playing since Jan 2014 and ive had no problems with lag. Now since last week ive been getting 150 Ping yet 60 stable fps, I Still cant play in these settings. Ive turned off my modem and computer numerous times yet nothings helping. I have not downloaded anything SO WHERE IS THIS SUDDEN LAG COMING FROM?

replies.body: Have you tried seeing if there's any other programs running in the background that are using up bandwidth?
